name: Fidus Investment Corporation
description: Fidus Investment Corporation is a publicly traded business development company (BDC) that specializes in providing customized financing solutions to lower middle-market companies across various industries. Founded in 2011 and headquartered in Wilmington, Delaware, Fidus is dedicated to supporting growth-oriented businesses through debt and equity investments. The company focuses on investing in companies with strong management teams, solid cash flows, and an established operational track record. Fidus primarily targets businesses with EBITDA ranging from $3 million to $25 million, offering a range of financial products, including senior secured loans, subordinated debt, and equity co-investments. Fidus aims to deliver attractive risk-adjusted returns to its shareholders while maintaining a strong commitment to responsible investing practices. The firm is known for its collaborative approach, working closely with portfolio companies to enhance their growth potential and operational effectiveness. With a seasoned management team and extensive industry experience, Fidus is well-positioned to identify and capitalize on investment opportunities in the evolving lower middle-market landscape.
ceo: J. Scott F. B. K. W. S. F. B. C. D. A. D. E. S. C.
